p: Regarding the nervous system, Silvestro et al. [ 11] studied the effect of cannabidiol, one of the cannabinoids with non-psychotropic action extracted from Cannabis sativa, against the severe treatment-resistant epilepsy in addition to common anti-epileptic drugs. An overview of recent literature and clinical trials showed that the use of cannabidiol could represent hope for patients who are resistant to conventional anti-epileptic drugs.
